content: from knit socks slipped stitches highlight the changes in multi colored yarns and even enliven solid colors on these unisex socks   they can be knit in either sport or fingering weight yarns   the stitch pattern is easy to memorize and the alternating row of stockinette and reverse stockinette rib between the slip stitches create a cozy sock with thermal warmth fingering-weight version   lorna s laces shepherd sock yarn 2 skeins us 1 needles gauge   32 sts = 4 inches in stockinette stitch sport-weight version mountain colors bearfoot 1 skein us 2 needles gauge 28 sts = 4 inches in stockinette stitch
